comments.author: dugar.siddhartha@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0a2) Gecko/20110515 Firefox/5.0a2
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0a2) Gecko/20110515 Firefox/5.0a2

In Windows when I switch to another window using Alt+Tab* and then press Alt+Tab it returns to the last used window. There should be a similar behavior for tabs.

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: dugar.siddhartha@gmail.com

In Windows when I switch to another window using Alt+Tab* and then press Alt+Tab it returns to the last used window. There should be a similar behavior for tabs.

comments.author: andrei.domuta@softvision.ro
comments.text: It looks more like an enhancement rather than a bug. If yes, please mark the Importance field accordingly. Thanks
